dcterms:creator: S. Gil
A. Abdelaziz
L. Senigagliesi
J. Li
T. M. Pham
dcterms:description: The dataset focuses on the use of angle of arrival (AoA) as a unique identity feature for authentication in wireless communication systems, particularly in the context of multi-robot networks.
dcterms:title: Angle of Arrival (AoA) as a unique identity feature

dcterms:creator: A. Abdelaziz
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for physical layer authentication based on the angle of signal arrivals, enhancing the security of wireless communications.
dcterms:title: Physical layer authentication based on AoA

dcterms:creator: L. Senigagliesi
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the use of a one-class support vector machine (OC-SVM) classifier for physical layer authentication, comparing various statistical and machine learning techniques.
dcterms:title: One-class support vector machine (OC-SVM) classifier

dcterms:creator: L. Senigagliesi
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for maximum likelihood estimation of angle of arrival (AoA) in the context of physical layer authentication.
dcterms:title: Maximum likelihood estimation of AoA

dcterms:creator: J. Li
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on channel state information for enhancing location privacy through fake path injection techniques.
dcterms:title: Channel state information for location privacy enhancement

dcterms:creator: T. M. Pham
dcterms:description: This dataset is related to machine learning-based robust physical layer authentication using angle of arrival estimation.
dcterms:title: Machine learning-based robust physical layer authentication
